Package the_game

Class EventManager

java.lang.Object
the_game.EventManager
public class EventManager extends Object
A class used to manage all events during the game.
Author:
Camille Girodengo

    • verifyIfEventAndTrigger

      public void verifyIfEventAndTrigger(Hero hero, Boss[] bosses, Teleport[] teleports, Wall[] walls, Chest[] chests, Enemy[] enemies) throws InterruptedException
      Verify all events that could possibly be activated or deactivated and execute the necessary actions by checking the state of various variables.
      Parameters:
      hero - the playable character of the game
      bosses - a Boss array which contains all the bosses of the current map
      teleports - a Teleport array which contains all the teleports of the current map and their terminals
      walls - a Wall array which contains all the walls of the current map
      chests - a Chest array which contains all the chests of the current map
      enemies - a Enemy array which contains all the enemies of the current map
      Throws:
      InterruptedException

    • triggerEvent

      public boolean triggerEvent(int eventID, Hero hero, Boss[] bosses, Teleport[] teleports, Wall[] walls, Chest[] chests, Enemy[] enemies) throws InterruptedException
      The function dedicated to the instructions to execute when a specific event is triggered.
      Parameters:
      eventID - the ID of the main event that has been triggered
      hero - the playable character of the game
      bosses - a Boss array which contains all the bosses of the current map
      teleports - a Teleport array which contains all the teleports of the current map and their terminals
      walls - a Wall array which contains all the walls of the current map
      chests - a Chest array which contains all the chests of the current map
      enemies - a Enemy array which contains all the enemies of the current map
      Returns:
      Returns true if the event's ID is recognized by the function and all instructions have been executed. Returns false if the function doesn't recognize the ID.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException
